QuestData.Title: Hero of the Sin'dorei
QuestData.Description: This is the beginning of a new chapter in the history of our race, $n. Our lands will be reclaimed and we shall cement our bond with Sylvanas and her allies.$B$BTake the traitor's head to Regent Lord Lor'themar Theron in Silvermoon City. He'll be eager to hear the news.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Dar'Khan's Head to Lor'themar Theron in Silvermoon City.
QuestData.CompletionText: You seek audience with me, $c? I do not recall hearing of an appointment.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that's one face I was not expecting to see so soon.$B$BThis is quite the good news, $N, in more ways than you can imagine.
